projects.name: Portfolio Website
description: - Created a portfolio website to showcase my experience and skills
- Developed the website with AI tools, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
- Deployed the website with Github Pages

projects.name: ChatGPT Workflow Optimization Chrome Extension
description: - Added features to an existing chrome extension for ChatGPT workflow optimization
- Features include prompt injection, context management, and prompt organization

projects.name: ThoughtNode Python Module
description: - Created ThoughtNode, an AI enhanced email digest system that keeps businesses up to date on market trends and users informed on their interests
- ThoughtNode web-scrapes and crawls to find information related to custom user topics
- Next, it uses an AI API to summarize data and extract insights
- Finally, this information is emailed to users periodically

projects.name: LLM Chain-of-Thought Reasoning Paper
description: - Co-Authored unpublished Chain-of-Thought Reasoning paper with Columbia University peers, Shayan Chowdhury and Priscilla Zhu
- Fine-tuned Meta's Llama-3.1-8B with questions from the AGIEval Math dataset, and used Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro as an evaluator
